project.teaser: The ACCURATE project aims to boost the competitiveness of European manufacturing companies and value chains by improving their sustainability, performance stability, resilience, and ability to manage unforeseen events. To achieve these benefits, ACCURATE will develop...
project.title: ACHIEVING RESILIENCE THROUGH MANUFACTURING AS A SERVICE, DIGITAL TWINS AND ECOSYSTEMS
project.keywords: data spaces, manufacturing ecosystems, cross-sectorial synergies, decision support systems, manufacturing as a service, supply chain management, digital twin, flexible manufacturing, human-centric

article.title: MaaS to increase the European industry’s competitiveness

result.title: High-level ecosystem architecture
result.description: Provides details on the overall ACCUTATE ecosystem conceptualization

result.title: Requirements specification and ontology service for semantic representation of components
result.description: Report of the specification for the ontology concept, the modelling, and its required interfaces.

result.title: Decentralized Data Space Infrastructure
result.description: Provide a robust, scalable, and resilient decentralized data space architecture designed for secure data sharing

result.title: Stakeholder engagement - mid-term report
result.description: Describing the liaison with EU initiatives and projects and the stakeholders’ engagement strategy

result.title: Standardization methodology - initial version
result.description: Details the consortium actions towards compliance with relevant standards

result.title: Frameworks for Resiliency- and Sustainability-Oriented Production Digital Twins
result.description: Provides the conceptual framework for measuring, and subsequently optimizing the resiliency and sustainability performance of production processes (within individual MAAS nodes) under uncertain future scenarios

result.title: Data Management Plan
result.description: Initial DMP describing data management lifecycle for the data to be collected, processed and/or generated during/by the project.

result.title: Compute-to-Data Environment
result.description: a secure Compute-to-Data (C2D) environment architecture integrated into the data space

result.title: Dissemination & communication strategy - initial version
result.description: details on the dissemination and communication strategies and activities

result.title: Exploitation pathway and IPR methodology - initial version
result.description: detailed consortium exploitation activities and IPR plan

result.title: Simulation and optimization model for supply chain management and stress test
result.description: Simulation and optimization model for supply chain management and stress test

result.title: Periodic Reporting for period 1 - ACCURATE (ACHIEVING RESILIENCE THROUGH MANUFACTURING AS A SERVICE, DIGITAL TWINS AND ECOSYSTEMS)
result.teaser: The ACCURATE project is dedicated to transforming the European manufacturing sector by delivering resilient and sustainable Manufacturing as a Service (MAAS) solutions. These innovations aim to enhance the competitiveness, performance stability, and sustainability of...

category.title: Report Summary
category.description: Result: Publishable summary (FP7 SESAM) and Summary for publication (H2020 SyGMa)

category.title: Digital agenda
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development of digital technologies and the digitisation of the economy and society (known as ‘Digital transition’).

category.title: Clean air
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the clean air policy (National Emission Ceiling Directive) aiming to improve ambient air quality and tackle air pollution, to protect the environment and human health.

category.title: Artificial intelligence
category.description: This tracker monitors Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to the development and deployment of AI-based technologies and solutions. Projects that develop AI-tools as part of their research method are included

category.title: Climate action
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to both mitigating climate change (e.g., contributions to the reduction of greenhouse gas emissions) and adapting to climate change by building resilience (e.g., regarding floods, droughts, spatial planning and better governance, adaptation to changing climate in value chains, etc.).

category.title: Biodiversity
category.description: This tracker monitors the Horizon Europe’s financial contribution to Europe’s biodiversity’s path to recovery including species protection, ecosystem conservation, and habitat rehabilitation, all essential for resilience in climate adaptation and addressing ecosystem services but also environmental crime and the health-environment connection.
